<suhwan>.name: Suhwan
<suhwan>.info: He often brings levity to the screen with his comedic timing and approachable personality. His signature glasses and sincere demeanor make him a memorable presence.

<wei>.name: Wei
<wei>.info: He exudes quiet strength and sophistication, often portraying serious and intense characters. His minimalist style enhances his charismatic presence.

<park>.name: Park
<park>.info: An elegant actress with a modern and poised style, she brings sophistication to her roles. Her calm gaze and confident stance show her composure and strength.

<yang>.name: Yang
<yang>.info: Wearing a Netflix varsity jacket, he blends a casual and creative vibe with unique personality. His round glasses and natural curls enhance his artistic and approachable look.
